DOC.brief_title: Specimen Collection From Pregnant Women Increased Risk Fetal Aneuploidy
DOC.detailed_description: To collect specimen purpose develop prenatal aneuploidy test . The test analyze circulate cell free fetal ( ccff ) nucleic acid blood sample pregnant woman increase risk indicator/s fetal chromosomal aneuploidy undergo invasive prenatal diagnosis chorionic villus sampling ( CVS ) and/or genetic amniocentesis . The result ccff aneuploidy test compare chromosomal analysis obtain via CVS genetic amniocentesis .
DOC.criteria: pregnant 10 22 week gestation 18 year age old provide sign date informed consent subject increase risk fetal aneuploidy subject willing undergo CVS and/or amniocentesis procedure purpose genetic analysis subject agree provide genetic result invasive procedure Fetal demise time specimen sample Previous sample donation protocol
